content:
• 24 hour front desk
  • Concierge desk
  • 24 hour Fitness center
  • On-site electric vehicle charging station
  • Multi-lingual staff
  • ATM on site
  • Same day laundry/dry cleaning
  • Valet Parking Available with in and out Privileges. $52/day plus tax
  • Oversized vehicle parking is $57/day plus tax (of similar size to a Suburban or larger.)
  • Bus Parking is available with advance notice. Please contact hotel to make arrangments.
  • Safe deposit box at front desk
